name: FREE!
description:
!NOTE!

If the game ends before you even played a second, please start again (who would think we have bugs).

WSAD or Arrows to Move / LEFT CLICK to swipe and break chains, kill shamans and destroy their huts.

To destroy huts you have to CLICK them, swiping doesn't affect them. Let's call it a feature.

You are an Evil Totem Spirit that has broken free from the shackles of Tribal Totem. Now is your chance for revenge on the shaman village. But beware, as the shamans will try to put you UNDER CONTROL with their shackle spells, and make you unable to move.

Destroy their huts before they are too many!

All coding and all assets (art, sounds, music, animations) have been made in the 48 hours during GameJam.
